extendedInfo.description: Watch mjpeg video streams on your phone!Attention: The linked example website in the stub app is not mine - so it can be offline or removed any time. Google for 'mjpeg' or 'axis cgi' if you do not have your own camera for example.This enables you to open mjpeg video stream in the browser and watch it. Just open a link and watch the video. No longer an unknown, broken file will be downloaded. Also private password protected websites are supported.Where is mjpeg used? Mostly mjpeg is used for streaming images from cameras placed all over the world presenting nice or interesting places to website visitors. Also most security cameras use mjpeg. Your Android phone can stream mjpeg with a lot of webcam apps, too! With the program VLC running on your pc mjpeg provides a simple method to stream any kind of video to your phone.Please note: Mjpeg video streams cannot be paused, rewinded or skipped forward. They are always shown as send by the server without further user interaction possible.

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: I set up an online webcam using an old laptop, Ubuntu and Motion and a USB webcam. This app plays the stream on my phone with no problems.
reviews.author: Keith Conley

reviews.title: Great plugin.......I can see my IP can in browser.
reviews.comment: Tip. Open android browser, go to your IP cam web adress , long press on the sceen , view image - enter user and pass - done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: F----- HORRIBLE
reviews.comment: For years I\'ve had an account and have never left negative feed back... this app completely deserves it.  CRASHS your phone DO NOT INSTALL!!!!  F-----------------------------------------

reviews.title: Great App.. worked first time
reviews.comment: Lenovo TPT  Really handy.... connects directly to the dlink dcs-932l ipcamera. perfectly.  If it could be customised for audio from that device I\'d rate it 6/5

reviews.comment: Works great. I\'ve had it for about 2 months now and haven\'t had any issues. We use it to view a camera in out baby nursery. Works great!

reviews.title: perfect!
reviews.comment: thank you so much for this.

reviews.title: Really Great!
reviews.comment: This app works like a charm! Let\'s me keep keep an eye on my shop!

reviews.comment: A good, simple app!

reviews.title: This is what I want
reviews.comment: I use it with linksys IP camera, it\'s simple and works. Only defect is sometime blacking out.

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: This app works great. Simple, easy to use, and fast. Using DDNS and some port forwarding I can access the Lowe\'s IRIS camera.

reviews.title: Works with motion
reviews.comment: Works great with motion or mjpg-streamer. But lacks multiple URL support...

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Used with \'motion\' web cam server... Very handy.

reviews.title: Simple and functional
reviews.comment: Works great with motion (linux). Would be much better if it supported multiple urls (I have 4 cameras just at one location)
reviews.author: Akom The Benevolent

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It works perfectly, but it\'s missing some features like being able to save more than one URL.
reviews.author: Jordi Vilaplana

reviews.title: Simple, no settings, but fully functional!
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says, and absolutely nothing more.  MJpeg viewer views a network mpjeg stream, like my webcam, and views it fullscreen, works well with auto-rotate enabled.  But don\'t expect ANY settings at all, other than the address to your mjpeg.
reviews.author: Joey Sullivan

reviews.title: Works fine
reviews.comment: I am running motion on ubuntu, streaming mjpeg

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Does what its suppose to do. Very basic.

reviews.title: First app I found that works well with mjpg-streamer
reviews.comment: Finally an app that handles mjpg-streamer properly.

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: I\'ve never felt inclined to rate an App before, but this is superb! Simple, working in seconds, so pleased I can see my video stream on the go. And free! Huge thanks x

reviews.title: Mjpg_streamer
reviews.comment: Great app for seeing live webcams. Tested with openwrt on tp-link wr1043nd running mjpg_streamer.
